commit.message:
Avoid race condition between compiler thread generating exception blob
and main thread generating adapters

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <asmehra@redhat.com>

Avoid adding AdapterHandlerEntry created for comparison to the handler
table.
Do not call delete on AdapterHandlerEntry. Instead call the destructor
explicitly through a deallocate() method.

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <asmehra@redhat.com>
